title: Why don't i have my silver banner after season 5 has ended?
body: I have been in Silver for a while now and i still don't have my silver banner. Someone please help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Same problem, i can see everyone elses but not mine. My friend said I don't have one I am in Silver 1..
any sort of ban  or restriction faced in the last 3 months or that were still active at the end of season. will exclude that account from getting end of season rewards.
